pages.text: [Malachite](entry://resources/malachite) as a material seems perfect for tools, best compared to [#](bb00bb)Diamond[#](), but much easier to combine with other materials.\These combinations are where the fun begins, allowing for some uniquely intricate tools.

pages.title: Workstaff
pages.text: The perfect [Multitool](entry://equipment/multitool):\$(k:sneak) + $(k:use) allows you to switch between [#](449900)Silk Touch[#]() and [#](449900)Fortune[#](), mining large tunnels at once and allows you to [#](449900)strip[#](), [#](449900)till[#]() and [#](449900)flatten[#]().

pages.title: Ultra Greatsword
pages.text: Its sheer size allows you to hit enemies from a greater distance.\If you hadn't included the [Paltaeria](entry://resources/paltaeria), you probably wouldn't even be able to lift it.

pages.title: Bident
pages.text: A true powerhouse when dealing with aquatic creatures.\\_It may have only two prongs compared to a [#](bb00bb)Trident[#](), but those are twice as pointy!_

pages.title: Crossbow
pages.text: Shoots projectiles at a higher speed and precision compared to a mundane [#](bb00bb)Crossbow[#]().
